items.title: parse error with timing_distribution: 'duration' was unexpected
items.body:
* Glean Parser version: 1.4.2
* Python version:
Python 2.7.16
Python 3.7.4
* Operating System:
Linux varney.localdomain 5.2.11-200.fc30.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Aug 29 12:43:20 UTC 2019 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux

### Description

I'm integrating the performance/graphics metrics here:
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1EZGVGmybvF1sH-XrsXMlplK7fWQfDniIeqXrkfDQrlc/edit#gid=0

to fenix using glean.

To do this, I'm using this branch of gecko, with the following modifications to
m-c/toolkit/components/telemetry/Histograms.json
https://github.com/bdekoz/gecko/commit/0add4785dca93a27bf6c2d015238739a259b3982

With this branch of fenix, which has app/metrics.yaml edits as per
https://github.com/bdekoz/fenix/commit/8e3b402c701d5445d6082057d5e0a78c422f3cf1

To smash these suckers together, I'm building a local geckoview as per these directions, the
"Dependency substiting your local GeckoView into a Mozilla project" part:
https://github.com/mozilla/geckoview/blob/gh-pages/contributor/geckoview-quick-start.md



Describe what you were trying to get done.
Tell us what happened, what went wrong, and what you expected to happen.

I'm hoping to get a nightly built, using the telemetry as defined. Install it on android. Then load a few sites, got to "about:telemetry" and inspect the JSON, and see the new histograms.

### What I Did

See above, then enter the fenix source directory, and type

./gradlew assembleDebug

Which gives:

 subprocess.check_call([
      sys.executable,
      '-m',
      module_name
  ] + sys.argv[3:])
  , glean_parser, 1.4.2, translate, -f, kotlin, -o, /home/bkoz/src/mozilla-fenix-bdekoz-fork.git/app/build/generated/source/glean/geckoBeta/debug/kotlin, -s, namespace=org.mozilla.fenix.GleanMetrics, -s, glean_namespace=mozilla.components.service.glean, /home/bkoz/src/mozilla-fenix-bdekoz-fork.git/app/metrics.yaml, /home/bkoz/src/mozilla-fenix-bdekoz-fork.git/app/pings.yaml, /home/bkoz/.gradle/caches/transforms-2/files-2.1/5f41b25223c80abfa33aba09059852a9/jetified-geckoview-default-71.0.20190905192215/metrics.yaml]' finished with non-zero exit value 1:
  
  ==============================================================================
  /home/bkoz/src/mozilla-fenix-bdekoz-fork.git/app/metrics.yaml:
      ```
      metrics:
        composite_time:
          duration:
            bugs:
            - 1080160
            - 1529352
            data_reviews:
            - https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1529352
            description: 'Composite times in milliseconds.
      
              '
            expires: '2020-12-01'
            gecko_datapoint: COMPOSITE_TIME
            notification_emails:
            - telemetry-performance-dev@mozilla.com
            time_unit: millisecond
            type: timing_distribution
      ```
      
      Additional properties are not allowed ('duration' was unexpected)
      
      Documentation for this node:
          Describes a single metric.
          
          See https://mozilla.github.io/glean_parser/metrics-yaml.html
  ==============================================================================
  /home/bkoz/src/mozilla-fenix-bdekoz-fork.git/app/metrics.yaml:
      ```
      metrics:
        composite_time:
          duration:
            bugs:
            - 1080160
            - 1529352
            data_reviews:
            - https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1529352
            description: 'Composite times in milliseconds.
      
              '
            expires: '2020-12-01'
            gecko_datapoint: COMPOSITE_TIME
            notification_emails:
            - telemetry-performance-dev@mozilla.com
            time_unit: millisecond
            type: timing_distribution
      ```
      
      Missing required properties: bugs, data_reviews, description, expires,
      notification_emails, type
      
      Documentation for this node:
          Describes a single metric.
          
          See https://mozilla.github.io/glean_parser/metrics-yaml.html


[build.20190905.log](https://github.com/mozilla/glean_parser/files/3582294/build.20190905.log)



```
Paste the command(s) you ran and the output.
If there was a crash, please include the traceback here.
```

items.title: CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md file missing
items.body:
As of January 1 2019, Mozilla requires that all GitHub projects include this [CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md](https://github.com/mozilla/repo-templates/blob/master/templates/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) file in the project root. The file has two parts:

1. Required Text - All text under the headings *Community Participation Guidelines and How to Report*, are required, and should not be altered.
2. Optional Text - The Project Specific Etiquette heading provides a space to speak more specifically about ways people can work effectively and inclusively together. Some examples of those can be found on the [Firefox Debugger](https://github.com/devtools-html/debugger.html/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md) project, and [Common Voice](https://github.com/mozilla/voice-web/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md). (The optional part is commented out in the [raw template file](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mozilla/repo-templates/blob/master/templates/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md), and will not be visible until you modify and uncomment that part.)

If you have any questions about this file, or Code of Conduct policies and procedures, please see [Mozilla-GitHub-Standards](https://wiki.mozilla.org/GitHub/Repository_Requirements) or email Mozilla-GitHub-Standards+CoC@mozilla.com.

_(Message COC001)_

items.title: kotlin.jinja2 missing import
items.body:
* Glean Parser version: latest? (Not sure how to check
* Python version: 2.7.15rc1
* Operating System: Ubuntu 18.04

### Description

I added an event with no extra_keys, this properly created the `EventMetricType` with the generic requirement of `NoExtraKeys`. The problem is `import mozilla.components.service.glean.NoExtraKeys` needs to be in the file for it to compile

### What I Did

Compilation failed after I added the event here:

```
/home/boek/git/mozilla-mobile/fenix/app/build/telemetry/src/armGreenfieldDebug/kotlin/Events.kt: (85, 44): Unresolved reference: NoExtraKeys
```

If I manually added the import it worked.

items.title: Move from Travis-CI to another CI (maybe Circle?)
items.body: With Travis CI more or less shutting down new development and treating their employees poorly, we should move this to an alternative CI platform.

items.title: Wiki changes
items.body:
FYI: The following changes were made to this repository's wiki:

- defacing spam has been removed

- Restricting write access to contributors is strongly encouraged.  Please [make that change](https://github.com/mozilla/glean_parser/settings)  ([documentation](https://help.github.com/articles/changing-access-permissions-for-wikis/)).

These were made as the result of a recent automated defacement of publically writeable wikis.

items.title: Don't allow lifetimes other than `Ping` for events
items.body:
* Glean Parser version: 0.6.0

### Description

Events only support `Ping` lifetime in glean, so we should not allow other lifetimes to be set in the metrics registry file.

items.title: [Components] glean must update the `glean_parser` packages if new versions are required
items.body:
* Glean Parser version: 0.6.0
* Python version: 3.7.0
* Operating System: Mac OS (building android-components)
